changeSet.author: irk333
changeSet.sql: alter table creditrequest add way_id int null; alter table creditrequest add CONSTRAINT fk_creditrequest_way FOREIGN KEY (way_id) REFERENCES reference (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE RESTRICT ON DELETE RESTRICT;
